original_title: Farewell From Moscow The Igor Larionov Farewell Game
overview: The Igor Larionov Farewell Game, Featuring the greatest hockey players from Russia and around the World. Featuring a lineup of legends including: Fetisov, Yzerman, Fedorov, Shanahan, Lidstrom, Lovalchuk, Brodeur, Robitaille, Chelios, Mogilny, Gonchar, Nemchinov, Tverdosvsky, Zhamnov and many more..  Includes the complete All-star game, interviews, and behind the scenes footage of the greatest hockey game in years.
title: Farewell From Moscow The Igor Larionov Farewell Game
